page.title: 03SCHOOL HISTORY & DEVELOPMENT
page.content: AT THE PRESENT TIME THE SCHOOL HAS 85 CHILDREN ON ROLL.WE HAVE 4 TEACHERS ON THE STAFF,MR. HEPWORTH, THE HEAD MASTER. MR. BEEVER, THE DEPUTY HEAD, MRS.OLLERENSHAW,AND MRS.PEEL.MRS BACON IS OUR SECRETARY AND WELFARE ASSISTANT. WE HAVE LOTS OF OUT OF SCHOOL ACTIVITIES,FOR INSTANCE FOOTBALL,NETBALL,CHESS CROSS COUNTRY RUNNING.GUITAR, RECORDER CLASS AND GARDENING. WE HAVE BUILT A POND THIS YEAR TO HELP US WITH OUR ENVIRONMENTAL STUDIES. OUR SCHOOL IS SPLIT INTO TWO HALVES,A MODERN BLOCK CONTAINING THE TWO JUNIOR CLASSES AND THE OLDER BUILDING CONTAINING THE KITCHEN AND THE TWO INFANT CLASSES. SOME OF OUR CHILDREN COME FROM AS FAR AWAY AS BRADWELL NEAR SHEFFIELD.
